name: Epic Revenge
description: This is an epic revenge story of police officer John. Officer john is honest and brave police officer. There was lot of crime in "Little flower" city, before police officer john posting there. One particular criminal was William henry and his family. After Police officer John posted there, William henry lost a large amount of illegal money and property. He and his gang wipe out from the city. In the rage, William henry order his men to kill Officer John. But the hitman kill the wrong person, Officer John wife. After that incident, William henry disappear from the city. Officer john search for William henry but he had no luck. After 5 year Officer john find William henry location. will he able to kill henry?
